message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is still a good deal for you, considering the value you place on the product.  Let's meet in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget is tight, but I can't go any lower than $10,000. This is a fair price that allows me to make a profit while still giving you a good deal. It's our last chance to come to an agreement. What do you say?

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,000. I'm willing to go up to $9,200, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I really need to make sure I'm getting a good deal on this product.
